attributes.action: Extend the window scrappage scheme, if adopted, to include small shops and businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would be an extension to the proposals in the domestic window scrappage scheme and would further reduce carbon and CO2 emissions and ease the energy overhead burden on small businesses.
The size limit on the business eligibility could be determined by rateable value.
